ComicInfo.Summary: Who kidnapped the Professor? Did a UFO land in New York City? Who is telling the truth about being abducted and who is lying? The answers to all those questions and more are in this issue as the Xenoholics are once again taken by aliens. But are the aliens friends... or Foes?
ComicInfo.Title: The Truth Is Here!
